body_html: I was running into this as well. I'm using an old Phenom II CPU. Bit annoying there isn't a way to get a version through pip without the AVX requirement. I personally have no direct use for this project, but a program I was trying to test out depends on it. I'll probably just give up on it, as this is more hassle than it's worth, already wasted way too much time this past week leading up to the discovery that this was the problem all along.
